text:
February
Twelfth
1940
Dr. Irvin I. Stewart, Director
Committee on Scientific Aids to Learning
41 East Forty-Second Street
New York, New York
Dear Dr. Stewarts
Last year you asked me to add your name to
the NAEB mailing list and you paid fS.OO for
the year to receive the NAEB News Letters
and packet material. I do not know whether
or not you wish to continue this service, but
in case you do, I am enclosing triplicate
copies of the bill for 1940.
Cordially yours.
Frank E. Sohooley
FES/rep
Enclosures
